      void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Closes the window where you can select the language and writes the selected language in language.txt when pressing the ok button in language window.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
        Closes the window where you can select the language and writes the selected language in language.txt when pressing the ok button in language window. After restarting CarDuinoDroid the language is changed.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - Event by pressing the ok button in language dialog.
